subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Atlanta’s Tony Gonzalez ended his 17-year career Sunday, finishing as the most productive tight end in N.F.L. history and second only to Jerry Rice in receptions by a player at any position.
snippet: Atlanta’s Tony Gonzalez ended his 17-year career Sunday, finishing as the most productive tight end in N.F.L. history and second only to Jerry Rice in receptions by a player at any position.
